decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The London Borough of Hounslow as the Local Planning Authority hereby certify that on the 12th October 2004 the matter described above is lawful within the meaning of section 191 and 192 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for the following reasons:

The proposed outbuilding, with a gabled roof with a ridge height of 3.9m, 6m deep and 4.9 m wide, 10.5 m from the house, in the rear garden, constitutes permitted development as defined by Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended) and therefore does not require planning permission.

Condition : 2 - Informative:
The detached outbuilding hereby found to be lawful shall only be used for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse at 28 Dean Road and for no other purpose (i.e. it shall not be used as a bedroom, living room, office or separate dwelling).
description: Certificate of lawfulness for the proposed erection of a single storey outbuilding to rear of existing dwellinghouse.
